name: Reaper (itch)
description:
Play as Death itself in an attempt to rid the city from all Criminals!

Every Criminal you kill will award you 10 points.

Every Citizen you kill will give you an extra 5 seconds, but lose you 10 points.

Weigh your options to get the best score!

And remember, Sacrifices must be made.

----------------------------

Controls:

Point and Click - Move

Scroll Wheel - Zoom

Space - Attack
